citations.narrative:
A male, Linneaus's two-toed sloth, Flash, sustained a nail injury by catching his nail in-between a double mesh barrier that
separates him from the younger female sloth. He received veterinary care for the injury and the facility has taken
measures to prevent any further injuries. Facilities that are constructed and designed inappropriately for the species
contained can lead to injury of the animals. Correct by April 26, 2023 by ensuring all enclosures are constructed of
materials appropriate for the animals involved and protect the animals from injury.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
A male, Linneaus's two-toed sloth, Flash, sustained a nail injury by catching his nail in-between a double mesh barrier that 
separates him from the younger female sloth. He received veterinary care for the injury and the facility has taken 
measures to prevent any further injuries. Facilities that are constructed and designed inappropriately for the species 
contained can lead to injury of the animals. Correct by April 26, 2023 by ensuring all enclosures are constructed of 
materials appropriate for the animals involved and protect the animals from injury. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
